I'm researching the burial practice for samurai. I need to write a 
paper and can't find any info on the net. I've found plenty on 
japanese funeral services but i need to find out if it was the sme 
for the samurai. I've heard of some being buried standingin full 
armour, but believe this was only for those of higher rank. All 
others were cremated. If anyone has any info on this subject i would 
greatly appreciate any help you could offer.

Lane
